amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike $2 million for the Doyle Drive Replacement project in San Francisco, California.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part C of House Report 111-219 to strike $2 million for the Doyle Drive Replacement project in San Francisco, California and reduce the overall cost of the bill by the same amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hensarling amendment (A022) Failed by recorded vote: 124 - 309 (Roll no. 634).
